review: d,addario makes great strings, this just where not the gages I was lookin for.other than that I like this brand of strings
this pedal worked well, but I sent it back because thru my marshall itgenerated a lot more line noise than I like, other than that it was cool!!!!
Cool tuner, I have this on my pedal board and it works really well, very easy to seeand is true bypass which is nice when it isn't on....
This pedal is a great delay pedal. works well with my marshall,Has a lot of feautures and is very versitale....

nice reverb pedal, got rid of my boss reverb. the tc pedals are all that is on byboard except my wah and a phase 90, if they made these pedals I'd probablybe all tc electronics! What else can I say!!!!
what can I say, this pedal has never left my pedalboard. is very versitable pedal. from a boast toalmost full out distortion that doesn't loose the sound of the buitar. cool pedal!!!!
got these stands to hold my guitars, they are o.k. for at home but i really wouldn't recomend them for gigging too much. they bend at the welds pretty easy and might break
